title: Fix my bugged 10min waits, your client is the reason i got wait times not my behavior.
body: %%%%s better fix my fucked unfair low priority bs. Your broken game froze my fucking laptop 3 games in a row untill I could find a fix yet I'm stuck with 10min waits, If you want toxic i'll be plenty toxic too all other players if you don't sort this fuck up out now

replies.body: These kinds of issues are most often YOUR client, not THE client. If you can go into more detail about the problem I can help you troubleshoot it, but the most general advice I can give you is to try repairing your client (settings > "Initiate Full Repair").
